parse.title: List of most expensive video games to develop

text.*:
This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.

The following is a list of the most expensive video games ever developed, with a minimum total cost of US$50 million and sorted by the total cost adjusted for inflation.

Name Year Developer Publisher Platform Development cost
(million US$) 		Marketing cost
(million US$) 		Total cost
(million US$) 		Total cost with 2018 inflation
(million US$)
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 2009 Infinity Ward Activision PC, PS3, Xbox 360 50 200 250[1] 285
Grand Theft Auto V 2013 Rockstar North Rockstar Games PC, PS3, PS4, Xbox 360, Xbox One 137[2] 128 265[3] 278
Star Wars: The Old Republic 2011 BioWare Electronic Arts, LucasArts PC 200[4] 200+[4] 218+
Halo 2 2004 Bungie Microsoft Studios PC, Xbox, Xbox One 40[5] 80[6] 120[5] 168
Destiny 2014 Bungie Activision PS3, PS4, Xbox 360, Xbox One <140[7] <140[7] 140[7][8][9] 145
Dead Space 2 2011 Visceral Games Electronic Arts PC, PS3, Xbox 360 60[10] 60 120 131
Final Fantasy VII 1997 Square Square, Sony Computer Entertainment (PS), Eidos Interactive (PC) PS, PS4, PC, iOS, Android 40-45[11][12] 40-100[13][12] 80-145 122-221
Grand Theft Auto IV 2008 Rockstar North Rockstar Games PS3, Xbox 360, PC 100+[14] 114+
APB: All Points Bulletin 2010 Realtime Worlds Electronic Arts, Realtime Worlds, Deep Silver (PS4, XB1) PC, PS4, Xbox One 100[15] 112

Deadpool 2013 High Moon Studios Activision PS3, PS4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, PC 100[18] 105
Disney Infinity 2013 Avalanche Software, Altron (3DS) Disney Interactive Studios PS3, Xbox 360, Wii, Wii U, 3DS, PC 100[19] 105
Tomb Raider 2013 Crystal Dynamics Square Enix PC, PS3, PS4, Xbox 360, Xbox One 100[20] 105
Red Dead Redemption 2010 Rockstar San Diego Rockstar Games PS3, Xbox 360 80-100[21] 80-100[21] 90-112
Enter the Matrix 2003 Shiny Entertainment Atari, Inc. GameCube, PC, PS2, Xbox 20[22] 67[22] 89
Defiance 2013 Trion Worlds, Human Head Studios Trion Worlds PC, PS3, Xbox 360 80 80[23] 84
The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt 2015 CD Projekt Red CD Projekt PC, Xbox One, PS4 46[24] 35[25] 81 84
Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain 2015 Kojima Productions Konami PC, PS3, PS4, Xbox 360, Xbox One 80 80[26] 83
Pokémon Red/Blue 1996 Game Freak Nintendo Game Boy 50[27] 50+ 78+
Watch Dogs 2014 Ubisoft Montreal Ubisoft PC, PS3, PS4, Wii U, Xbox 360, Xbox One 68[28] 68+ 70+
Shenmue 1999 Sega AM2 Sega Dreamcast, PS4, PC, Xbox One 47-70[29][30] 47-70[29] 69-103
Crysis 3 2013 Crytek Electronic Arts PS3, Xbox 360, PC 66[31][32][clarification needed] 66 69
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier 2012 Ubisoft Paris, Red Storm Entertainment, Ubisoft Bucharest, Ubisoft Kiev (PC) Ubisoft PC, Xbox 360, PS3 65[33] 65[33] 69
Too Human 2008 Silicon Knights Microsoft Game Studios Xbox 360 60-100[34] 60-100 68-114
Gran Turismo 5 2010 Polyphony Digital Sony Computer Entertainment PS3 60[35] 60 67
Rift 2011 Trion Worlds Trion Worlds PC 50 10-20 60-70[36] 65-76
Gears of War: Judgment 2013 Epic Games, People Can Fly Microsoft Studios Xbox 360 60[37] 63
Heavy Rain 2010 Quantic Dream Sony Computer Entertainment PS3, PS4 21.8[38][39] 30.4[38][39] 52.2[38][39] 59
Final Fantasy IX 2000 Square Square PS, PS4, PC, iOS, Android 40[40] 40+ 57+
E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial 1982 Atari, Inc. Atari, Inc. Atari 2600 22[41] 56
DC Universe Online 2011 Daybreak Game Company Daybreak Game Company, Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment PC, PS3, PS4, Xbox One 50[42] 50[42] 54
L.A. Noire 2011 Team Bondi Rockstar Games PS3, PS4, Switch, Xbox 360, Xbox One, PC 50[43] 50 54
Darksiders II 2012 Vigil Games THQ PS3, PS4, PC, Wii U, Xbox 360, Xbox One 50[44] 53
Half-Life 2 2004 Valve Corporation Valve Corporation PC, PS3, Xbox, Xbox 360 40[45] 40 52
World of Warcraft 2004 Blizzard Entertainment Blizzard Entertainment PC 40[46][unreliable source?] 52
